paragraph.paragraph: The Eiffel Libraries folder has a simple context menu accessible by right clicking on the folder. The available items are as follows:

Add, Add New Cluster When selected a new cluster will be added under the Eiffel Libraries folder. For more information on adding new clusters, see ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_clusters.xmlAdding New Clusters.

Delete
Delete is unavailable because top-level project folders cannot be deleted or removed.

Properties
Displays the ../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/eiffel_libraries.xmlEiffel Libraries Folder Properties.
